meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>daring</kanji> <kanji>fruit</kanji> is very <vocabulary>resolute</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>bold</vocabulary>! She's going to go out and be a fruit superhero or scientist or something.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
